frame.name: Remembering_experience
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> calls up an episodic memory of past <fen>Experience</fen> or an <fen>Impression</fen> of a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> formed on the basis of past experience. The <fen>Cognizer</fen> may also remember the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> in a particular <fen>State</fen>, which serves as a frame of reference in the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s mind. When attention is focused on a <fen>Salient_entity</fen>, then mention of a global <fen>Experience</fen> is excluded and typically, but not always, either a <fen>State</fen> or <fen>Impression</fen> of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is presented.
<ex></ex> Episodic memory is the explicit memory of events. It includes time, place, and associated emotions (which affect the quality of the memorization). Episodic memory contrasts and interacts with semantic memory, the memory of facts and concepts. The Remembering_information frame is concerned with this latter type of memory.
<ex><fex name="cog">Kozmo</fex> could <t>remember</t> <fex name="exp">when his modem was the fastest he could buy</fex>.</ex>
<ex>That's probably before my time, which was long time ago, <fex name="cog">Fish</fex> may <t>remember</t> <fex name="exp">that time</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="cog">Who</fex> <t>remembers</t> <fex name="exp">me being a total dork and going up to everyone saying "Hey, I'm Ashley Hunt from Chicago"</fex>!?!</ex>
<ex> I wanted to <t>remember</t> <fex name="exp">how good that felt</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Hummel says <fex name="cog">staff, both students and professional,</fex> <t>remember</t> <fex name="sal">her</fex> <fex name="imp">as a "very good friend, available for new staff and well-respected by everyone."</fex></ex>
<ex>Somehow <fex name="cog">I</fex> <t>remember</t> <fex name="sal">him</fex> <fex name="imp">as older, with long eyelashes, and doe eyes</fex>.</ex>
<ex>When he died he was just a kid himself but for some reason at the age of 44 <fex name="cog">I</fex> still <t>remember</t> <fex name="sal">him</fex> <fex name="sta">as older than me</fex>. </ex>
<ex>Retro games are great, but a lot of the time <fex name="cog">people</fex> get clouded by nostalgia and <t>remember</t> <fex name="sal">them</fex> <fex name="sta">to be better than they really were</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="cog">He</fex> <t>remembered</t> <fex name="sal">him</fex> <fex name="imp">as a kindly man but not a very lively one.</fex> </ex>
<ex><fex name="exp">The part</fex> <fex name="cog">I</fex> <fex name="viv">vividly</fex> <t>remember</t> was about a South Seas tramp steamer captain . </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition:
<def-root>A person who recalls memories of past experience or impressions.
<ex>I will truly miss Delmar and <fex name="cog">I</fex> will always <t>remember</t> when his eyes lit up everytime he got ice-cream.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Salient_entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>A person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers as being involved in some state or event or as having some property.
<ex>today I saw a sister's exclassmate, and didn't recognise him, I <t>remember</t> <fex name="sal">him</fex> taller.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Experience
FE.definition:
<def-root>A past event or state that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> witnessed and is now recalling. The <fen>Experience</fen> may be a specific event or state or a vaguer period that is treated as a unit.
<ex> I can still <t>remember</t> <fex name="exp">saying the pledge every morning before class in elementary school</fex>, a rare occurrence among elementary school kids nowadays. </ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Impression
FE.definition:
<def-root>A property that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> attributes to the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> based on their past experience of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> or a category to which the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is assigned.
<ex>I <t>remember</t> Peter <fex name="imp">as immensely kind in those first three weeks before I was packed off to boarding school</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: State
FE.definition:
<def-root>A property or role that a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> actually held and which frames the memories that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
<ex>Atulprasad is principally <t>remembered</t> <fex name="sta">as a musician and composer</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Vividness
FE.definition:
<def-root>The degree of detail and/or immediacy of a remembered <fen>Experience</fen>.
<ex>Brian Wooley only <fex name="viv">dimly</fex> <t>remembered</t> the hand falling on his shoulder</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Context
FE.definition:
<def-root>A situation in which the Cognizer encountered the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
<ex>She was just how I <t>remember</t> her <fex name="con">from school</fex> .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
<ex>I 'll <fex name="tim">never</fex> <t>forget</t> being in hospital</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the event (or state) which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously) and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may also indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> that affect the action (fondly).
<ex>Bill will be <fex name="man">fondly</fex> <t>remembered</t> by all.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The amount of time for which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
<ex> Your generosity and kindness will be long <t>remembered</t> <fex name="dur">for years to come</fex>. </ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: remember.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: think of a past experience

lexUnit.name: memory.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a recollection of an event or entity from the past

lexUnit.name: look back.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: call to mind a past experience

lexUnit.name: reminisce.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: be engaged in enjoyable recollection of past events.
